amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute comprises the budget proposal of the Republican Study Committee and appears on page H3149 of the Congressional Record of April 10, 2014.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Woodall.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 291 (Roll no. 175).
